MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I didn't expect you to turn into a living, doll-sized man.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: The moment Laika entered the house, the frozen formula was lit up with magic. That's when I figured out that the dollhouse was a detonator.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I don't know what time period people came up with this stuff, but it's in bad taste. They make you dream, they lure you in, and then they kill you...It's like the Mist.
The spell that Shimoamazu had put on me is extremely effective. As soon as she leaves, my fever goes down and my sluggishness and pain disappear completely.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I am very sorry to have to say goodbye to her, because she was such a dear doll to me. But it's the only thing I could have done.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: A shaman always has to choose between sealing and destroying. To seal is not justice. Destroying it is not bad, but the opposite is also true. You have to keep a strong mind and choose without hesitation.
That's quite deep. Who said that? Ooenomiya?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: No. It's a quote from Shimoamazu the first...my mother. It has helped me many times. It's helped me not to be so hurt when things like this happen.

Although she says so, Shimoamazu's eyes are somewhat sad as she looks at the exploded dollhouse. If she knew from the beginning that it was a weapon, it would be different. But, she loved it as a doll for a few days, so it's not unreasonable.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Come on, let's get back to town.
I need to get back to my original size, too...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I can carry you, but we'll have to hide in the bushes and in the shadows. Because when the curse is lifted, you'll be naked.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Just kidding! I'm sure you'll be back to normal soon.
Because Laika is no longer with us.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
She's an ancient mechanical weapon with special powers.
It's not magic, it's not sorcery, it's a terrible power.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I told you...Laika is not a doll, but a weapon.
Shimoamazu continues to run through the bushes without looking back. There is no sign of anything approaching from behind, so why is moving away from that dollhouse so fast?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I locked Laika in. I used my full power on the spell I cast on the door. It's the strongest sealing spell that even a monster can't break. If it's broken, we won't stand a chance.

...and seals the front door with a spell,
so that Laika can't get out.

While Laika crouches and starts counting,
Shimoamazu pulls my hand and runs as fast as she can to the front door.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Conductor, let's go.
Behind us is the dollhouse from earlier...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
No, that's not super threatening because there are ways to break the spell.
The really scary part is after you become "friends" with her...
It seems that Shimoamazu has been made smaller by the spell, and when she removes the tag from her chest, she returns to her original size. Now I can be hugged by Shimoamazu again.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
This is the most comfortable way to walk. Please be patient for a while.
The first priority right now is to break the curse.
Show my friends around my house!
She's looking at me. She's staring so much.
Then Laika's blue eyes light up and she says her usual line.
As I follow Laika, I see an old mansion in the bushes. But perhaps it is a dollhouse. It should be about the size of a doghouse to a normal person.

The moment I enter the mansion,
Laika turns around and holds out her pure white hands to me.
I was lonely for so long.
...I'm in a serious pinch. The spell seems to have prevented me from becoming a real doll, but I've become so small that I fit in Shimoamazu's hands.
I have to stay home alone.

She asks, "So...Will you play with me?"
When Laika smiles at me, I reflexively try to take her hand.
Right now, I have no choice but to be carried by Shimoamazu. That in itself is not a problem. Rather, it is a perk. I can feel her chest, or even her heartbeat, with my whole body.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I think we're safe here. Conductor, turn around.

But it's not just the smaller version of me that Shimoamazu is carrying.
It's also...that doll.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Let's play hide and seek, the three of us. Laika, you'll be it.

Shimoamazu? What the hell are you doing here?
Don't tell me you've also shrunk?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'll explain later. But for now, please shut up.
...Okay. I'll leave it to you.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Laika, close your eyes and count to 3.
In the meantime, we're going to hide somewhere in the house.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's where I picked up Laika.
Okay!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: If the spell wears off, you really will become a doll, Conductor.
I'm Laika.
Shimoamazu places Laika upright on the ground and gives her a little poke on the back with her fingertips, which are filled with magical power.
The dollhouse that trapped Laika explodes after emitting an intense light from the inside. Perhaps even if I returned to human form, it would be deadly if I were caught in an explosion of that level.
Today, I'm going to show my friends around my house.
Yeah! I didn't become a doll, but I did become a doll-sized human!

That was a close call. If it hadn't been for Shimoamazu, I might have died.
But how did she know how such a mysterious weapon worked?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...I've never heard that line before.

By terrible power,
do you mean a curse that turns the target of your blows into a doll?

We're in a forest on the outskirts of St. Iris.
It is a place that was recently hit by Phantom Mist.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Come on, Laika, it's time for a walk.
Tell me everything you know about this place and about you.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
But looks like it couldn't completely prevent
the curse of Laika's "dollification"...
I'm Laika.
As told by Shimoamazu, I chase the mysterious doll, Laika. Even though I'm chasing a doll, it's no different than chasing a normal girl because I'm also small.

Laika goes into the bushes by herself.
There must be something in this place after all.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shimoamazu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Conductor, follow Laika.
I'll disappear, but don't worry, I'll be watching you.
This is my home! Come on, let's play together.
Shimoamazu is right, the curse placed on me by Laika is soon lifted. I didn't bring any replacement clothes, so I borrow three of Shimoamazu's papers to cover up for now.
